title: 95/251/EC: Council Decision of 29 June 1995 on the progressive dismantling of certain quantitative restrictions on imports of certain ECSC products
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of  29 June 1995 on the progressive dismantling of certain quantitative restrictions on imports of  certain ECSC products (95/251/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
The national restrictions applied by the Kingdom of Spain to imports  originating in third countries falling within CN codes 2701  11, 2701  12  90 and 2701  19 shall be  eliminated by 31 December 1997 at the latest.
The Annex to this Decision gives the annual limits which Spain can apply to imports of the products  listed therein during the abovementioned period.
The Kingdom of Spain shall charge the licences already issued at the date on which this  Decision takes effect against the quantities for 1995.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Spain. It shall take effect on the day of  its notification.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 29 June 1995.
For the Council The President J. BARROT
